meanings: (요즘) these days, nowadays, (최근) lately, recently, (formal) of late
a fortress blessed with natural barriers for defense

vlive.korean: 요새 아니면 뭐... If it's not recent, then what... 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤이 꼽은 가장 힘이 센 멤버는? #스타로드 03
